## FieldDropdown.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `FieldDropdown` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(menuGenerator: MenuGenerator, validator?: FieldDropdownValidator, config?: FieldDropdownConfig);
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

menuGenerator


</td><td>

[MenuGenerator](./blockly.menugenerator_typealias.md)


</td><td>

A non-empty array of options for a dropdown list, or a function which generates these options. Also accepts Field.SKIP\_SETUP if you wish to skip setup (only used by subclasses that want to handle configuration and setting the field value after their own constructors have run).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

validator


</td><td>

[FieldDropdownValidator](./blockly.fielddropdownvalidator_typealias.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ A function that is called to validate changes to the field's value. Takes in a language-neutral dropdown option &amp; returns a validated language-neutral dropdown option, or null to abort the change.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

config


</td><td>

[FieldDropdownConfig](./blockly.fielddropdownconfig_typealias.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ A map of options used to configure the field. See the \[field creation documentation\][https://developers.google.com/blockly/guides/create-custom-blocks/fields/built-in-fields/dropdown\#creation](https://developers.google.com/blockly/guides/create-custom-blocks/fields/built-in-fields/dropdown#creation) for a list of properties this parameter supports.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

## Exceptions

{<!-- -->TypeError<!-- -->} If `menuGenerator` options are incorrectly structured.
